tool_description: Realize the intelligent and fast denoising of the compressed blurred image, optimize the image texture details, and make the picture more natural and clear.
name: Image Definition Enhance
title: Image Definition Enhance

api_list.name: Image Definition Enhance

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `PNG` `JPG` `JPEG` `BMP`
- **Image size**: No more than 8 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 10x10px, smaller than 5000x5000px.
- **Image aspect ratio**: Aspect ratio within 4:1.
